name: test_details_crtsh_wrong_data
description:
Test endpoint "/details/crtsh"

    Send wrong data and expect error.

steps.name: [STEP] POST /details/crtsh
[STEP] Check status code
Assert real "400" equal to expected "400"
Real value is: 400
Expected value is: 400
[STEP] Check if dict contains given key - "detail"
Assert {'detail': "'url' is a required property", 'status': 400, 'title': 'Bad Request', 'type': 'about:blank'} contains detail
Key is: detail
Dictionary is: {'detail': "'url' is a required property", 'status': 400, 'title': 'Bad Request', 'type': 'about:blank'}
[STEP] Check if item "detail" is equal to "'url' is a required property"
Assert real "'url' is a required property" equal to expected "'url' is a required property"
Real value is: 'url' is a required property
Expected value is: 'url' is a required property
[STEP] Check if dict contains given key - "title"
Assert {'detail': "'url' is a required property", 'status': 400, 'title': 'Bad Request', 'type': 'about:blank'} contains title
Key is: title
Dictionary is: {'detail': "'url' is a required property", 'status': 400, 'title': 'Bad Request', 'type': 'about:blank'}
[STEP] Check if item "title" is equal to "Bad Request"
Assert real "Bad Request" equal to expected "Bad Request"
Real value is: Bad Request
Expected value is: Bad Request
